ModMetaData.name: LMC001N.壁灯
ModMetaData.author: Murmur
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Mod/Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 英文名：Wall Light 添加直接放置在墙上的照明灯。默认设定下，壁灯的功率较小，但提供的照明范围比标准灯要少。 Adds a light that is placed directly on walls. By default the light uses less power but also provides less light than the standard standing lamp.
